description:
***** About Remake *****
This game is Remake of our work "Traditional Tactics Ne+". The changes are as follows:
- Adopt "Cheer Magic" instead of Support Card.
- Redesign the battle maps.
- Use thinking program "SESS-AI 2.0".
- Add a new unit "Sui".
- Guest unit is gettable by entering password.

***** for Beginners *****
If you don't know about Simulation RPG, this game is very helpful.
- In "Lesson Mode", you can see the rules easily.
- You can save playing data at any time in the battle.
- The most important thing to complete is thinking, not technique.
- You don't have to repeat bored work.
- The story is never cruel, so you will feel very enjoyable.

***** Story *****
You are "Prince Natri", explore the dungeon "Royal Tomb" to be the king. In there, many spirits are waiting to make a trial of your courage. Let's fight and try the simulation battle with your units!

***** Overview *****
This is team's turn-based Simulation RPG. Rules are simple and reasonable, but never easy. To win the battle, you must use "Cheer Magic" well. The most important thing is your inspiration.

***** SESS-AI 2.0 *****
We made the thinking program "SESS-AI 2.0". By it, enemy acts so various that you will be amazed. This experience exists only in our game.

***** Language *****
English and Japanese are available.
